entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the afternoon then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
